job.title: ServiceNow Developer
job.description: We are currently accepting resumes for a ServiceNow/ATF Developer in Columbus, OH.<br><br>Required Skills and Experience:<br><br>- Bachelor’s degree in computer science, management information science, or related field<br>6-8 years’ experience<br> <br>ServiceNow Developer skillset: Flow designer, Service Portal,CSM<br>ATF Developer - all the above plus ATF<br><br>Must have a strong CSM and Service Portal skillset<br>ServiceNow Contractor with Specialty experience with Customer Service Mgmt (CSM Module).<br>Experience and knowledge of CSM and how it interacts with platform modules<br>Angular, Javascript<br>CSM<br>CSM Portal (external and internal)<br>Agent Workspace<br>Major Case<br>Natural Language<br>Customer Mobile<br>Service Catalog/Service Request<br><br>UNICON International, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer.<br><br>If you are interested in working for an organization where honesty, integrity and quality are among the core principles then click apply today!<br><br>Keywords: ServiceNow, ATF, CSM, Angular, Javascript, Agent Workspace, Major Case, Natural Language, Customer Mobile, Service Catalog/Service Request
